A vindication of the Roman Catholicks from the foul aspersions thrown upon them by John Tillotson ... in a sermon preached by him in November, 1687 ... Antoine.
[15] p.
Printed for John and Thomas Lane ..., London : 1688.
Attributed to M. Antoine. Cf. McAlpin Coll. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
